website_summaries.verdict: A well-designed tool that is lauded for its accuracy.
pros: Comes with a protective case and cloth for cleaning
The tool is easy to read and use with metered bands of color to help you determine ABV
cons: Like some other products, a fairly large amount of test liquid is needed for results

customer_reviews.title: Math is done for you!
customer_reviews.text: We watched all kinds of videos from the YouTube channel CitySteading and decided we were ready to make our first mead. We used their recommendation link to this hydrometer. We have used it a handfull of times already and appreciate that the numbers are separated by what type of wine you might get based on the sugar content (I.e a moscato, sweet wine etc) it's like the math is done for you! The case is solid plastic and closes well and keeps the hydrometer nice and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: easy for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used one of these and it was super simple to use. I wish I would have looked and seen it DOES NOT come with the tube. The ones that do come with the whole set up are a couple dollars more. now I have to spend more money to get the complete set. Otherwise it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading ad

customer_reviews.title: Just pay an extra buck for a kit with a graduated cylinder.

customer_reviews.title: QC'd out at Zero!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these hydrometers in the hopes that one would QC out at zero. I hate having to remember to do a correction when using them. Both of these QC'd as accurate! I QC'd 2 other brands and they did not. Brewer's Elite will be my go to brand when I drop another carboy on one! The numbers are easy to read and I like the color coding. The case is also a bonus. Great protection and it is easy to get the hydrometer out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Divnbrian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice device for brewing your own prison hooch at home!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product! It really deserves 4.5 stars. I brew home wines in store-bought jugs of juice with this and a cheap carbouy vent. This product is a quality measuring tool. I just wish it was a little shorter, for use in my juice jugs. Maybe they could develop one, with simpler markings for survivors gravity. I think the intent is for use with large batches, and measuring your samples in a graduated cylinder. I just want to be able to tell how much sugar to add, and when it's ready! PS - try keeping a sourdough starter for your home brews! Yummy and renewable!
customer_reviews.author: ScubaSteve

customer_reviews.title: Quality unit packaged well
customer_reviews.text: This is a precision tool that does its job well. It comes packaged in a sturdy plastic case with foam pads at both ends and in the middle. There is a set of indentations that helps the top of the case "click" into place, so it stays on. Combine this with a quality test jar and you have a great setup for your home brewing, winemaking, or distilling.
